values: 迫使；驱使；驱赶；驱动；激励；开车；驾驶；驾车送（人）；拥有（或驾驶）…汽车；猛踢；猛击（球）
驾驶；驱动力；驱赶；冲劲；动力；冲动；激励；动机；强烈欲望；本能需求；推进力；推动力；传动装置；驱动装置；猛击；猛踢；（高尔夫）开球；驱车旅行；长途行车；车程；（计算机）驱动器；（住宅区的）车道；（为某种目的的）集体努力

synonym.mean: 驱动器；驾车；内驱力，推进力；快车道

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 强劲的；推进的；精力旺盛的
驾驶员；驱动程序；起子；传动器
畜群；牛群、羊群等；移动的人群或大批的东西
把家畜赶到市集的人；家畜商人；牲畜贩子

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指骑在车、马上行驶。
指乘坐在有轮子的交通工具之内，控制其行驶。
强调驱使人们采取行动的原因或动机。
侧重外来的驱策力和内心的感情力量的驱使。

word_group.brief_definition: 无人驾驶汽车；自动驾驶汽车
驱动系统；连锁倒地伐木法
电机驱动装置；电动卷片装置
闪存驱动器；闪存盘；随身碟

bilingual.source: I decided to drive to the market.
Does your dad drive his car to work?
Why don't we drive to the countryside?
bilingual.target: 我们为什么不开车去乡下？

bilingual.source: The more carefully you drive, the safer it is.
Then people don't have to drive to work.
bilingual.target: 那样人们就不用开车上班了。

bilingual.source: So we can drive or ride wherever we like.
bilingual.target: 所以我们可以随处开车或骑车。

bilingual.source: More people drive cars instead of riding bikes.
bilingual.target: 更多人开车而不是骑自行车。
十六岁的孩子应该被允许开车。

list.abstract: 《Drive》是美国女流行乐歌手Miley Cyrus的第四张录音室专辑《Bangerz》的一首歌曲。
这是由Tyzo Bloom和JNNA演唱的歌曲，发行于专辑《Drive》中。

yingyinNormal.en: But I don't drive, and I can't take the bus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但我不会开车，我也不想坐公交车。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll drive today. Is everybody ready? Ready.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天我来开车。大家准备好了？好了！

yingyinNormal.en: Should we drive to the playgroud? No, let's walk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们应该开车去运动场吗？不，我们走着去。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, drive safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小心开车。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, can You drive me? I don't drive. Well, I can't drive!
yingyinNormal.zh: 你能车我去吗？我不开车的。但我开不了。

yingyinNormal.en: Will he drive you to the dance? He's rented a limo. So he won't drive you? Limos come with drivers. So stop worrying.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他开车送你去参加舞会吗？他租了一辆大轿车。他不开车？轿车自配司机，别操心了。

yingyinNormal.en: So let me get this straight. You don't know how to drive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想先弄清楚，你不会开车？

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is taking the family for a drive in the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天猪爸爸要开车带大家去玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is taking the family for a drive in the country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天猪爸爸要开车带大家去玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Remember Daddy Pig, this is another country. They may drive differently here. Driving is driving, Mummy Pig. It can't be that different?
yingyinNormal.zh: 记住，猪爸爸，这是另一个国家。他们可能开车的方式不同。开车就是开车，猪妈妈，这能有多难？

yingyinNormal.en: Remember Daddy Pig, this is another country. They may drive differently here. Driving is driving, Mummy Pig. It can't be that different?
yingyinNormal.zh: 记住，猪爸爸，这是另一个国家。他们可能开车的方式不同。开车就是开车，猪妈妈，这能有多难？

yingyinNormal.en: Do you have your own car? I don't drive.Of course you don't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有车吗？我不开车。我想也是。

yingyinNormal.en: You to watch him drive cars, you to have dinner with a friend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要看他开车，你要跟朋友吃饭。

yingyinNormal.en: And in the meantime you better let him drive. Does he have a license? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，让他开车，他有驾照吗？有。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, girls, I got to go. Us too. Drive safely. Bye.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，姑娘们，我得走了。我们也是。开车注意安全哦，拜。

yingyinNormal.en: Why did we drive all the way across town for The Happy Platter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们为什么要开车到城市另一头来吃快乐的盘子？

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, you need to learn how to drive. This madness has to stop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，你得学会开车。不能再这样疯下去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Could you at least drive me there? To Maya's house of horrors?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那您至少要开车送我去吧？送你去玛雅的恐怖小屋吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And you have a vehicle? A car, yeah. And you'll be willing to drive me? Can't you drive? I can. I choose not to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有交通工具吗？有辆车。你愿意载我吗？你不会开车吗？我会，我不想开。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Wait. You have to drive me to work. Yeah, I really don't think I do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别，等等，你一定要开车送我去上班。我看未必。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

examination_example.sentence: In Britain the move towards open access publishing has been <highlight>driven</highlight> by funding bodies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，开放存取出版的趋势是由资助机构推动的。

examination_example.sentence: To a certain extent, our ability to excel in making the connections that <highlight>drive</highlight> intelligence is inherited.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，我们在建立驱动智力的联系方面的卓越能力是遗传的。

examination_example.sentence: They are energetic participants in a global economy <highlight>driven</highlight> by the flow of work, money and ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们是由工作、金钱和思想流动驱动的全球经济的积极参与者。

sense_info_list.en: force someone to act in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: The value of work is also <highlight>driving</highlight> folks to continue working past retirement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作的价值也驱使人们在退休后继续工作。

examination_example.sentence: The insight that curiosity can <highlight>drive</highlight> you to do self-destructive things is a profound one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好奇心可以驱使你去做自我毁灭的事情，这是一个深刻的见解。

examination_example.sentence: There could be many mechanisms working together that <highlight>drive</highlight> us in choosing genetically similar friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可能有许多机制共同驱使我们选择基因相似的朋友。

examination_example.sentence: It's as if you're <highlight>driving</highlight> a stick shift.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就好像你在开手动挡。

examination_example.sentence: It gives us patience for ourselves and toward others as well as patience while <highlight>driving</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它给了我们对自己和他人的耐心，以及开车时的耐心。

examination_example.sentence: Think about <highlight>driving</highlight> a route that's very familiar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想想驾驶一条非常熟悉的路线。

sense_info_list.en: urge or force animals or people to move in a specified direction

examination_example.sentence: The shortage is compounded by federal immigration raids, which remove some workers and <highlight>drive</highlight> others underground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 联邦移民突击检查加剧了这种短缺，这些突击检查驱逐了一些工人，还把其他人驱赶到地下。

examination_example.sentence: Introductory computer-science classes can <highlight>drive</highlight> the less-experienced or -determined students away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 计算机科学入门课可以赶走经验不足或缺乏决心的学生。

sense_info_list.en: an organized effort by a group of people to achieve something

examination_example.sentence: The fates of Wunderlist and Sunrise are examples of a remorseless <highlight>drive</highlight> by Big Tech.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Wunderlist和Sunrise的命运就是大型科技公司无情运动的例子。

examination_example.sentence: The creation of the ‘statistics board' is part of Science's overall <highlight>drive</highlight> to increase reproducibility in the research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “统计委员会”的建立是《科学》提高研究可重复性的整体努力的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Driving</highlight> her point home, she continued: "It's increasingly apparent that the absence of purpose, could become one of the most dangerous goals."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了解释明白，她继续说道：“目标的缺乏，将成为最危险的目标之一，这点愈发显而易见。”

examination_example.sentence: Efforts to resolve the skills mismatch in Canada have <highlight>driven</highlight> up labour costs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加拿大努力解决技能不匹配的问题，这抬高了劳动力成本。

examination_example.sentence: Likewise, automation should eventually boost productivity, stimulate demand by <highlight>driving</highlight> down prices, and free workers from hard, boring work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，自动化最终应该会提高生产率，通过压低价格来刺激需求，并将工人从艰苦、无聊的工作中解放出来。

sense_info_list.en: an innate, biologically determined urge to attain a goal or satisfy a need

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>drive</highlight> to discover is deeply rooted in humans, much the same as the basic drives for food or shelter.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 探索的内驱力深深植根于人类，就像寻找食物或住所的基本内驱力一样。

sense_info_list.en: a trip or journey in a car
(in ball games) hit or kick the ball hard with a free swing of the bat, racket, or foot

word_usage.usage: drive sb. away即可以表示驾车送走某人也可以表示使某人离去；使不愿久留、赶走某人。
sb. drive off指驱车离去；驶去，而drive sb./sth. off则指击退；赶走某人、某物。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 动力; 决心; 激励; 促进
有组织的努力; 运动

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

examination_example.sentence: It benefits those who are learning to <highlight>drive</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对那些正在学习开车的人有好处。

sense_info_list.en: an innate, biologically determined urge to attain a goal or satisfy a need
sense_info_list.zh: 动力; 决心; 激励; 促进

examination_example.sentence: And while successful people are <highlight>driven</highlight> to achieve their goals, the ultra successful have even greater ambition.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当成功人士被驱使去实现他们的目标时，超级成功的人有更大的野心。

examination_example.sentence: In an image-centered and pleasure-<highlight>driven</highlight> world, Postman noted, there is no place for rational thinking, because you simply cannot think with images.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Postman指出，在一个以图像为中心、以快乐为驱动的世界里，没有理性思考的空间，因为你根本无法用图像思考。

examination_example.sentence: Those deemed to be most destructive were odd people, those without <highlight>drive</highlight> and those with an unpleasant temperament or personality in general.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 古怪的人、没有动力的人，以及那些总的来说性情或性格不佳的人被认为是最具有破坏性的。

sense_info_list.en: (of a source of power) provide the energy to set and keep an engine or piece of machinery in motion

examination_example.sentence: At the same time, he also suffered tremendously from a need for acceptance that <highlight>drove</highlight>, and sometimes stained, every one of his relationships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，他也因为需要接受而遭受巨大的痛苦，这种需要驱动着他的每一段感情，有时甚至玷污了它。

sense_info_list.en: urge or force animals or people to move in a specified direction

examination_example.sentence: It creates a toxic culture of brilliant jerks that <highlight>drives</highlight> people out and erodes itself from within.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它创造出了一种由杰出的混蛋组成的有毒的文化，将人们赶走，从内部侵蚀自己。

sense_info_list.en: a short road leading from a public road to a house or other building
an organized effort by a group of people to achieve something
sense_info_list.zh: 有组织的努力; 运动

sense_info_list.en: force someone to act in a particular way

word_usage.usage: drive表示“开车，驾驶”，而drive in表示“乘坐”。
开汽车时用drive；驾驶轮船用pilot；骑自行车用ride；但表示驾驶飞机，fly和pilot这两个词都均可。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重外来的驱策力和内心的感情力量的驱使。
强调驱使人们采取行动的原因或动机。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 动力; 决心; 激励; 促进

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

examination_example.sentence: Days fare the deadly 2017 wildfires in Santa Rosa, Californian, a drone (无人机) caught footage (连续镜头) of a USPS worker, Trevor Smith, <highlight>driving</highlight> through boomed homes in that familiar white van, collecting mail in an affected area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在加州圣罗莎市2017年那场致命的野火发生后的几天，一架无人机捕捉到了美国邮政局工作人员特雷弗·史密斯驾驶着那辆熟悉的白色面包车穿过熙熙攘攘的住宅区，在受灾地区收集邮件的镜头。

examination_example.sentence: Roads would be quieter, people safer. But we must also consider the impact of the new technology on those who now depend on <highlight>driving</highlight> for their livelihoods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 道路将更加安静，人们将更加安全。但我们也必须考虑到新技术对现在依靠开车谋生的人的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Forgetting how to <highlight>drive</highlight> to the house of a friend you've visited many times before can also be signs of something going wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 忘记了如何开车去您曾经多次拜访过的朋友的家，也可能是出问题的迹象。

sense_info_list.zh: 动力; 决心; 激励; 促进

examination_example.sentence: It will <highlight>drive</highlight> technological progress on a global scale.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它将推动全球范围内的技术进步。

examination_example.sentence: This may be <highlight>driven</highlight> partly by self-deception or "wishful thinking''.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这在一定程度上可能是由自欺欺人或“一厢情愿”促成的。

examination_example.sentence: This, in turn, has a major effect on their diet, leading scientists to speculate that the ability to learn population-specific hunting methods could be <highlight>driving</highlight> the animals' genetic development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这转而又会对其饮食习惯产生重大影响，该情况引发科学家猜测：学习种群特有狩猎方式的能力可能正推动虎鲸的基因进化。

sense_info_list.en: (of a source of power) provide the energy to set and keep an engine or piece of machinery in motion

examination_example.sentence: It is possible that the wellbeing of pets is <highlight>driven</highlight> by the underlying nature of the owner, not simply by their conscious decisions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 宠物的幸福可能是由主人的潜在本性驱动的，而不仅仅是他们有意识的决定。

sense_info_list.en: urge or force animals or people to move in a specified direction

examination_example.sentence: Invasive species are <highlight>driving</highlight> away certain native species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 入侵物种正在赶走某些本土物种。

sense_info_list.en: force someone to act in a particular way

word_usage.usage: drive表示“开车，驾驶”，而drive in表示“乘坐”。
开汽车时用drive；驾驶轮船用pilot；骑自行车用ride；但表示驾驶飞机，fly和pilot这两个词都均可。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重外来的驱策力和内心的感情力量的驱使。
强调驱使人们采取行动的原因或动机。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 驱车旅行; 驾车路程

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

examination_example.sentence: By the way, do you also need me to <highlight>drive</highlight> you home tomorrow afternoon?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 顺便问一下，你明天下午还需要我开车送你回家吗？

examination_example.sentence: It used to be that you could <highlight>drive</highlight> for miles here without seeing another person, but now there are houses and people everywhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前你可以在这里开车数英里而不看到另一个人，但现在到处都是房子和人。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>drove</highlight> over and saw the chick in the nest looking healthy and active.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我开车过去，看到巢里的小猫头鹰看起来健康而活泼。

examination_example.sentence: A flood had hit the area earlier that year and the damage it caused had <highlight>driven</highlight> away a number of birds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那年早些时候，一场洪水袭击了该地区，造成的损失赶走了许多鸟类。

examination_example.sentence: I've <highlight>driven</highlight> teams of horses and carried water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我赶过马队，扛过水。

examination_example.sentence: The coyotes killed a large percentage of the park's red foxes, and completely <highlight>drove</highlight> away the park's beavers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 郊狼杀死了公园里很大一部分的红狐，并彻底赶走了公园里的海狸。

sense_info_list.zh: 驱车旅行; 驾车路程

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Drive</highlight> LAB is helping us to understand what the key points and difficulties are for older drivers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 驾驶实验室正在帮助我们了解对年长的司机来说什么是重点和难点。

examination_example.sentence: The Intelligent Transport team at Newcastle University have turned an electric car into a mobile laboratory named "<highlight>Drive</highlight> LAB".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽卡斯尔大学的智能交通团队已经将一辆电动汽车变成了一个名为“驾驶实验室”的移动实验室。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有组织的努力; 运动

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 猛烈的；有巨大影响力的；掌握控制权的
n. 驾驶员；司机；传动装置；主动轮；推动力；球棒；驱赶某种动物的人；激励器；驱动程序

word_family.mean: v. 驾车；开车；推动；驱动；赶；驱赶；迫使；逼迫；赶走；会开车

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 无人驾驶汽车；自动驾驶汽车

examination_example.sentence: The couple got back into their car and started <highlight>driving</highlight> south.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对夫妇回到车里，开始向南行驶。

examination_example.sentence: Most gas cars can <highlight>drive</highlight> hundreds of miles on a full tank.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数燃油汽车在加满油的情况下可以行驶数百英里。

examination_example.sentence: The engineers are going to test (测试) the self-<highlight>driving</highlight> car in our city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工程师们正准备在我们的城市测试无人驾驶汽车。

sense_info_list.en: urge or force animals or people to move in a specified direction

examination_example.sentence: However, the goose looked angry and tried to <highlight>drive</highlight> him away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，那只鹅看起来很生气，想把他赶走。

examination_example.sentence: Having some sports <highlight>drives</highlight> away your stress easily most of the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数时候，做一些运动可以很轻松地消除你的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Elephants <highlight>drive</highlight> away the flies by using their ears.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大象用耳朵驱赶苍蝇。

sense_info_list.en: (of a source of power) provide the energy to set and keep an engine or piece of machinery in motion

examination_example.sentence: The grammar troubled me a lot and even <highlight>drove</highlight> me crazy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 语法让我很烦恼，甚至快把我逼疯了。

examination_example.sentence: Dreams are powerful and they can <highlight>drive</highlight> you to work harder and become better than before.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 梦想是强大的，它能驱使你更加努力地工作，变得比以前更好。

examination_example.sentence: It can move on wheels, walk on legs or be <highlight>driven</highlight> by small engines (发动机).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以用轮子移动，用腿行走，或者由小型发动机驱动。

sense_info_list.en: a trip or journey in a car

examination_example.sentence: It is about five minutes' <highlight>drive</highlight> to the nearest village of Portreath.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 距离最近的Portreath村约5分钟车程。

examination_example.sentence: A short <highlight>drive</highlight> later, we arrived at a busy, noisy factory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一小段车程后，我们来到了一个繁忙嘈杂的工厂。

examination_example.sentence: The trip would have been nice, but the <highlight>drive</highlight> was too long.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不是车程太远，这躺旅行还是挺不错的。

sense_info_list.en: force someone to act in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: I have to share a room with my little brother, and he's <highlight>driving</highlight> me mad!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我必须要和我的小弟弟共享房间，这让我很抓狂。

examination_example.sentence: Now people all across America were going to find out who <highlight>drove</highlight> the kids' mother up a tree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在全美国的人们都想知道是谁把孩子们的母亲逼到了树上。

examination_example.sentence: The snow <highlight>drove</highlight> him forward again
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大雪迫使他再次前行。

sense_info_list.en: an innate, biologically determined urge to attain a goal or satisfy a need

examination_example.sentence: Welcoming change in life is a <highlight>drive</highlight> to become better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 欢迎生活中的变化是变得更好的动力。

sense_info_list.en: an organized effort by a group of people to achieve something
sense_info_list.zh: 有组织的努力; 运动

examination_example.sentence: When someone donated bottles of water, Ewan and his family held a <highlight>drive</highlight> to get even more.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当有人捐出瓶装水后，尤恩和他的家人发起了募捐活动，希望得到更多的水。

word_usage.usage: drive表示“开车，驾驶”，而drive in表示“乘坐”。
开汽车时用drive；驾驶轮船用pilot；骑自行车用ride；但表示驾驶飞机，fly和pilot这两个词都均可。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指乘坐有轮子的交通工具，控制其行驶。
通常指骑在车、马上行驶。
